title: Corpse Party: Missing Footage
synopsis: Someday a group of classmates will perform a charm at night after school—the Happy Sachiko charm. This paper doll ritual is meant to make them stay friends forever, but performing it incorrectly will lead them to be dragged down into a dilapidated phantom of Tenjin Elementary School, which had been torn down years ago. Trapped until they can reunite and perform the charm correctly, the students will have to solve the mystery of the haunted school in order to make it out alive. Before that ill-fated event, however, the friends led ordinary lives. Corpse Party: Missing Footage reveals an insight into the students' lives on the day before they were thrust into a waking nightmare.

details.Japanese: コープスパーティー Missing Footage

title: Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis: The first series from the GiftMovie Project, which was aired in between theater commercials at all 57 TOHO Cinemas theaters. It features a rabbit called Rope and his senpai squirrel Akira, and their long, disrupted way to the movie theater.

title: Kamiusagi Rope 2
synopsis: The sequel to Kamiusagi Rope; it also aired in between commercials at theaters.

title: Kamiusagi Rope tsuka, Natsuyasumi Rasuichi tte Maji ssuka!?
synopsis: An actual movie of the Kamiusagi Rope series, featuring Rope and Akira, as they experience a thrilling adventure in their downtown.

details.English: Paper Rabbit Rope: Wait Last One For Summer Vacation For Real!?
details.Japanese: 紙兎ロペ　つか、夏休みラスイチってマジっすか！？

title: Kamiusagi Rope Movie Episode 0
synopsis: A special episode made for the Kamiusagi Rope Movie premiere. It features paper squirrel Akira's older sister, who has trouble with choosing which earrings to wear for her date.

title: Kamiusagi Rope x au Collaboration
synopsis: A collaborative advertisement between Kamiusagi Rope and au (a Japanese mobile phone company), where Rope and Akira interact with modern cellular technology.

details.English: Paper Rabbit Rope x AU Collaboration
details.Synonyms: Kamiusagi Rope: Tomokomi-hen, Kamiusagi Rope: Wifi...?-hen, Kamiusagi Rope: Smaho de!?-hen

title: Kamiusagi Rope x Panasonic Collaboration
synopsis: A collaborative advertisement video between Kamiusagi Rope and Panasonic, where Rope and Akira interact with Panasonic's new surround headphones.

details.English: Paper Rabbit Rope x Panasonic Collaboration
details.Japanese: 紙兎ロペ　パナソニックコラボEP

title: Kamiusagi Rope 3 (ONA)
synopsis: Two ONA specials of Kamiusagi Rope. Feng Shui: Rope and Akira run into their friend's mother. Undou Shinkei: Akira and Rope tries flying a kite, although it ends up stuck in a tree.

details.Synonyms: Kamiusagi Rope, Feng Shui, Undou Shinkei

title: Nagareboshi Lens
synopsis: The story follows Risa, a girl with zero experience in romance. Meanwhile, a boy named Yuugure is the most popular student in Risa's school year. Even though the two have had no contact with each other in the past, they find themselves at school at the same time one night.  (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: Shooting Star Lens, Ribon Festa 2012, Ribbon Festa 2012

title: Marimo no Hana: Saikyou Butouha Shougakusei Densetsu
synopsis: The story of the manga centers around Marimo Nogami, a usually quiet fourth-grade girl in elementary school. However, a certain incident leads to Marimo's personal strength blossoming.  (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: Marimo's blossom: The Legend of the Strongest Elementary School Fighter Student, Ribon Festa 2012, Ribbon Festa 2012
details.Japanese: まりもの花 ～最強武闘派小学生伝説～

title: Detective Conan Bonus File: Fantasista Flower
synopsis: "Fantasista Flower" is a side-story OVA related to The Eleventh Striker.  (Source: Detective Conan World)

details.Synonyms: Detective Conan Magic File 6: Fantasista Flower, Meitantei Conan Bonus File: Fantasista no Hana
details.Japanese: 名探偵コナン BONUS FILE ファンタジスタの花

title: Detective Conan OVA 12: The Miracle of Excalibur
synopsis: The Miracle of Excalibur is the twelfth OVA of the anime and manga franchise Detective Conan. The plot is based on Gosho Aoyama's short story "Excalibur." (Source: Detective Conan World)

details.Synonyms: Detective Conan: The Miracle of Excalibur, Meitantei Conan: The Miracle of Excalibur
details.Japanese: 名探偵コナン　えくすかりばあの奇跡

title: Wild Adapter
synopsis: Makoto Kubota wandered through life, not taking things too seriously or looking too deep within himself. His job as the head of the Izumo Group's youth gang kept him pleasantly occupied with yakuza wars, mahjong and assassinations... Until the day he stumbled upon a strange drug called Wild Adapter that produces bizarre side-effects—including death. Forever changed, Kubota becomes entangled with a drifter named Minoru Tokito, and the two form an unlikely companionship that draws them deeper into the mystery of Wild Adapter... (Source: Tokyopop)

title: To LOVE-Ru Darkness OVA
synopsis: Bundled with the 5th, 6th, 8th, 9th, 12th and 13th limited-edition volume of the manga.

details.Synonyms: To LOVE-Ru Trouble Darkness OVA, To-Love-Ru Darkness OVA, ToLoveRu Darkness OVA
details.Japanese: To LOVEる -とらぶる- ダークネス

title: Queen's Blade: Rebellion Specials
synopsis: Specials included in the Blu-ray/DVD volumes. Each special will be about a different character.

details.Synonyms: Queen's Blade Rebellion: Genkai Toppa de Miechau no!?, Queen's Blade Rebellion: What Will It Look Like When It Smashes Through Restrictions!?
details.Japanese: クイーンズブレイド リベリオン 限界突破で見えちゃうの

title: Souhaku Shisuferia
synopsis: Shoujo Byou (少女病) doujin musical group's Souhaku Shisuferia CD single included a music video DVD with original animation.

title: Accel World: Acchel World.
synopsis: Spin-off of Accel World included on the anime Blu-ray/DVDs.

details.Synonyms: Accel World Specials, Accelerated World Specials
details.Japanese: あくちぇる・わーるど。

title: Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi
synopsis: One day, when Remu Mikage is on a video call with his sister, Shiki, who has traveled to the futuristic Okinotori-island Mega Float City for school, she confesses that both the audio and visuals of her are completely artificial. In order to be more efficient in her studies, Shiki has used neural-linked nanomachines to upload her consciousness onto a computer and is storing her physical body in a "body pool." While shocked, Remu is supportive of his sister's decision, until the disaster known as the "Early Rapture" happens. The Early Rapture causes everyone who has uploaded their consciousnesses to either fall into a coma or perish. Remu visits his sister's empty apartment one last time, but is shocked when Shiki arrives at the door. With no memory of her family or past, and being pursued by a violent group of researchers, Shiki and her brother are forced to flee using her newfound power of nanomachine manipulation.
background:
Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi was one of the four films of Anime Mirai 2013 (Young Animator Training Project), a project funded by the Japanese government's Agency of Cultural Affairs in order to support training animators.

It was pre-aired on February 25, 2013 on nicolive.

details.Synonyms: Wakate Animator Ikusei Project, 2012 Young Animator Training Project, Anime Mirai 2012, Aruvu Rezuru, Aruvu Rezuru: Kikai Jikake no Yousei-tachi, Aruvu Rezuru: Mechanized Fairies, Arve Rezzle: Mechanized Fairies, Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yoseitachi
details.Japanese: アルヴ・レズル -機械仕掛けの妖精たち-
